title: Abundant Ammunition
description: Replaces nonmagical ammunition every round.

title: Air Bubble
description: Creates a small pocket of air around your head or an object.

title: Alarm
description: Wards an area for 2 hours/level.

title: Animal Messenger
description: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.

title: Ant Haul
description: Triples carrying capacity of a creature.

title: Anticipate Peril
description: Target gains a bonus on one initiative check.

title: Aspect of the Falcon
description: Gives bonuses on Perception and ranged attacks.

title: Bowstaff
description: A shortbow may double as a club, or a longbow as a quarterstaff.

title: Call Animal
description: Makes an animal come to you.

title: Calm animals
description: Calms 2d4 + level HD of animals.

title: Charm Animal
description: Makes one animal your friend.

title: Cloak of Shade
description: Reduces effects of intense sun exposure and environmental heat.

title: Compel Hostility
description: Compels opponents to attack you instead of your allies.

title: Dancing Lantern
description: Animates a lantern that follows you.

title: Deadeye's Arrow
description: You create an arrow made of crackling electricity, which you may fire as a weapon or use as a glowing beacon.

title: Defoliate
description: You hurl a tiny ball of negative energy, destroying plant life either in a line 60 feet long or a 10-foot-radius spread.

title: Delay Poison
description: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/level.

title: Detect Aberration
description: Detect presence of aberrations.

title: Detect Animals or Plants
description: Detects kinds of animals or plants.

title: Detect Poison
description: Detects poison in one creature or object.

title: Detect Snares and Pits
description: Reveals natural or primitive traps.

title: Detect the Faithful
description: You can detect other worshipers of your deity.

title: Diagnose Disease
description: Detect and identify diseases.

title: Dream Feast
description: Dream of a rich feast and when you awake, you are sated as if you ate and drank a nutritious meal.

title: Endure Elements
description: Exist comfortably in hot or cold regions.

title: Entangle
description: Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft. radius.

title: Feather Step
description: Subject ignores adverse movement effects in difficult terrain.

title: Glide
description: No fall damage, move 60 ft./round while falling.

title: Gravity Bow
description: Arrows do damage as though one size category bigger.

title: Hide from animals
description: animals can't perceive one subject/level.

title: Horn of Pursuit
description: Create three notes heard miles away.

title: Hunter's Howl
description: Treat enemies as favored for 1 round/level.

title: Jump
description: Subject gets bonus on Acrobatics checks.

title: Keen Senses
description: Gain +2 Perception and low-light vision.

title: Know the Enemy
description: Gain +10 on a monster Knowledge check.

title: Lead Blades
description: Melee weapons damage as if one size bigger.

title: Liberating Command
description: Target makes an Escape Artist check as an immediate action and gains a bonus on it.

title: Longshot
description: Grants a +10-foot bonus to the range increment for any ranged weapon fired.

title: Longstrider
description: Your base speed increases by 10 ft.

title: Magic Fang
description: One natural weapon of subject creature gets +1 on attack and damage rolls.

title: Negate Aroma
description: Subject cannot be tracked by scent.

title: Pass without Trace
description: One subject/level leaves no tracks.

title: Read Magic
description: Read scrolls and spellbooks.

title: Residual Tracking
description: Tell creature's appearance by footprint.

title: Resist Energy
description: Ignores 10 (or more) points of damage/attack from specified energy type.

title: Returning Weapon
description: Grants a weapon the returning special weapon quality.

title: Speak with animals
description: You can communicate with animals.

title: Summon Minor Ally
description: Summon 1d3 Tiny animals.

title: Summon Nature's Ally I
description: Summons creature to fight for you.

title: Tireless Pursuit
description: Ignore fatigue while hustling.

title: Unbreakable Heart
description: Target gains a +4 bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects that rely on negative emotions.

title: Wartrain Mount
description: Animal gains combat training.

title: Accelerate Poison
description: Hastens targeted poison's onset.

title: Acute Senses
description: Subject gains a bonus on Perception checks.

title: Allfood
description: Turns item up to 5 lbs./level into food.

title: Animal Aspect
description: You gain some of the beneficial qualities of an animal.

title: Ant Haul, Communal
description: As ant haul, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Ape Walk
description: Target gains climb 30 and +8 racial bonus on Climb skill checks.

title: Arrow Eruption
description: Creates duplicates of an arrow used to kill a creature in the previous round.

title: Aspect of the Bear
description: +2 AC and combat maneuver rolls.

title: Badger's Ferocity
description: Weapons are keen while you concentrate.

title: Barkskin
description: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.

title: Bear's Endurance
description: Subject gains +4 to Con for 1 min./level.

title: Bloodhound
description: Gives caster the scent special ability.

title: Brow Gasher
description: Slashing weapon deals bleed damage to an opponent’s head.

title: Campfire Wall
description: Creates a shelter around a campfire.

title: Cat's Grace
description: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.

title: Chameleon Stride
description: Gives a +4 bonus on Stealth checks and concealment.

title: Create Treasure Map
description: Creates treasure map out of a creature’s corpse.

title: Cure Light Wounds
description: Cures 1d8 damage + 1/level (max +5).

title: Eagle Eye
description: Creates a magical sensor high above you.

title: Effortless Armor
description: Armor you wear no longer slows your speed.

title: Endure Elements, Communal
description: As endure elements, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Forest Friend
description: Plants in a forested area become helpful instead of hindering you and your allies.

title: Guiding Star
description: Know approximate distance from where you cast this spell.

title: Hide Campsite
description: Hides all traces of your campsite.

title: Hold Animal
description: Paralyzes one animal for 1 round/level.

title: Hunter’s Eye
description: +20 on Perception checks to locate a target.

title: Locate Weakness
description: You roll damage twice when you roll damage for a critical hit and take the best damage.

title: Lockjaw
description: Gives creature grab ability with a natural attack.

title: Owl's Wisdom
description: Subject gains +4 to Wis for 1 min./level.

title: Perceive Cues
description: +5 Perception and Sense Motive 10 min./level.

title: Protection from Energy
description: Absorbs 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.

title: Protective Spirit
description: Protects from attacks of opportunity.

title: Reloading Hands
description: Loads a single shot into your weapon every round.

title: Returning weapon. Communal
description: As returning weapon, but you may divide the duration among weapons touched.

title: Ricochet Shot
description: Imbues a projectile weapon to give its ammunition the ability to ricochet.

title: Slipstream
description: Wave boosts creature’s speed.

title: Snare
description: Creates a magic booby trap.

title: Speak with Plants
description: You can talk to plants and plant creatures.

title: Spike Growth
description: Creatures in area take 1d4 damage, may be slowed.

title: Stone Call
description: 2d6 damage to all creatures in area.

title: Summon Nature's Ally II
description: Summons creature to fight for you.

title: Versatile Weapon
description: Weapon bypasses some DR.

title: Web Shelter
description: Create a comfortable shelter made of webbing.

title: Wilderness Soldiers
description: Nearby plants aid you in combat.

title: Wind Wall
description: Deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and gases.

title: Animal Aspect, Greater
description: As animal aspect, but you gain two animal qualities.

title: Aspect of the Stag
description: +2 AC against attacks of opportunity and increases speed.

title: Blessing of the Mole
description: 1 ally/level gains darkvision and a +2 Stealth bonus.

title: Bloody Claws
description: Gives creature the ability to deal bleed damage with natural attacks.

title: Burrow
description: Target gains a burrow speed of 15.

title: Burst of Speed
description: You gain increased speed, and your movement ignores attacks of opportunity and allows you to move through the space of creatures larger than you are.

title: Channel the Gift
description: Channel magical power into target to fuel their spellcasting. The next 3rd level or lower spell target casts does not expend a spell slot; instead you use your spell slot to power their spell.

title: Cloak of Winds
description: Creates a whirling screen of strong wind around you.

title: Command Plants
description: Sway the actions of plant creatures.

title: Companion Mind Link
description: You can talk with your animal companion, and can handle it with supernatural ease.

title: Cure Moderate Wounds
description: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max. +10).

title: Darkvision
description: See 60 ft. in total darkness.

title: Delay Poison, Communal
description: As delay poison, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Diminish Plants
description: Reduces size or blights growth of normal plants.

title: Feather Step, Mass
description: As feather step, but affects many targets rather than one.

title: Fickle Winds
description: Wind walls selectively block attacks.

title: Instant Enemy
description: Target is treated as a favored enemy type of your choice.

title: Life Bubble
description: Protects creatures from sustained environmental effects.

title: Magic Fang, Greater
description: One natural weapon gets + 1/four levels (max. +5).

title: Named Bullet
description: Imbues ammunition with accuracy against a specific creature type.

title: Neutralize Poison
description: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.

title: Plant Growth
description: Grows vegetation, improves crops.

title: Protection from Energy, Communal
description: As protection from energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Reduce Animal
description: Shrinks one willing animal.

title: Remove Disease
description: Cures all diseases affecting subject.

title: Repel Vermin
description: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.

title: Resist Energy, Communal
description: As resist energy, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Soothing Word
description: Reduces effects of multiple conditions on target.

title: Strong Jaw
description: Natural attacks damage as two sizes larger.

title: Summon Nature's Ally III
description: Summons creature to fight for you.

title: Tireless Pursuers
description: As tireless pursuit, but affects many targets rather than one.

title: Tree Shape
description: You look exactly like a tree for 1 hour/level.

title: Venomous Bolt
description: Arrow or bolt poisons target.

title: Water Walk
description: Subject treads on water as if solid.

title: Animal Growth
description: One animal doubles in size.

title: Aspect of the Wolf
description: Subject gains +4 Str and Dex, and +2 bonus on trip attacks.

title: Blessing of the Salamander
description: Subject gets fast healing 2, fire resistance 10, +2 CMD.

title: Bloodsworn Retribution
description: Cut yourself and swear an oath of retribution on your own blood. Any attack, save, or check related to the oath grants you a morale bonus to that roll equal to the number of hit points of damage you sacrificed divided by 5.

title: Bow Spirit
description: Summons an invisible spirit that fires your arrows for you as a swift action.

title: Commune with Nature
description: Learn about terrain for 1 mile/level.

title: Cure Serious Wounds
description: Cures 3d8 damage + 1/level (max +15).

title: Darkvision, Communal
description: As darkvision, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.

title: Darkvision, Greater
description: See 120 ft. in total darkness.

title: Find Quarry
description: You can sense whether a particular creature is within 20 miles of your location.

title: Freedom of Movement
description: Subject moves normally despite impediments to movement.

title: Grove of Respite
description: Creates trees and a small spring.

title: Named Bullet, Greater
description: As named bullet, but deals 2 points of damage per caster level.

title: Nondetection
description: Hides subject from divination, scrying.

title: Raise Animal Companion
description: As raise dead, but on an animal.

title: Shield of the Dawnflower
description: Creatures that strike you take 1d6 +1/level fire damage.

title: Summon Nature's Ally IV
description: Summons creature to fight for you.

title: Terrain Bond
description: Treat the terrain you are in as a favored terrain for the spell’s duration.

title: Tree Stride
description: Step from one tree to another far away.

title: Water Walk, Communal
description: As water walk, but you may divide the duration among creatures touched.
